name: Beginner
description: The introductory level where you learn the basics

name: Novice
description: You have gained some knowledge and are ready for more challenges

name: Intermediate
description: You have progressed beyond the basics and are tackling more complex problems

name: Advanced
description: You have developed a high level of skill and can handle difficult problems

name: Expert
description: You have mastered the subject and are considered a true authority in the field
